- [ ] Customize for Cardiology Edge Engage webapp

## Project Overview
This is a Next.js webapp showcasing the Edge Engage Execution Method applied to cardiology work at Gundersen Health System.

## Technology Stack
- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS v4
- Framer Motion for animations
- Static export for Netlify deployment

## Development Notes
- Based on the Edge Engage Method V2 from edge-team-showcase
- Focus on cardiology-specific content and use cases
- Maintains similar structure and design patterns
